original_title: UAE President invites RW to COP28
original_body_lines: UAE President Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan has invited President Ranil Wickremesinghe to the Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (COP28), which will be held in Expo City Dubai this November.
The letter sent by the UAE President was delivered by the UAE Ambassador to Sri Lanka Khaled Nasser Al Ameri, to President Wickremesinghe.
